es.situm.sdk.location

Enum LocationStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<LocationStatus>
      • es.situm.sdk.location.LocationStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<LocationStatus>

    public enum LocationStatus
extends Enum<LocationStatus>
    Location status values used in LocationListener.onStatusChanged(LocationStatus)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BLE_NOT_AVAILABLE
      Bluetooth not available or using Android SDK API < 18.
      BLE_SENSOR_DISABLED_BY_USER
      The BLE sensor has been disabled by the user.
      CALCULATING
      The positioning service is calculating the user location.
      COMPASS_CALIBRATION_NEEDED
      The compass is uncalibrated and need to be calibrated
      COMPASS_CALIBRATION_NOT_NEEDED
      The compass is now calibrated and sending valid data
      GLOBAL_LOCATION_NOT_FOUND
      Used in indoor-outdoor mode during initialization.
      LOCATION_DISABLED
      The location has been disabled.
      NO_CONNECTION
      Warning received when no internet connection is available
      PREPARING_POSITIONING_MODEL
      The positioning model is been prepared to be used
      PROCESSING_POSITIONING_MODEL
      The positioning model is been processed after download
      RETRY_DOWNLOAD_POSITIONING_MODEL
      The download of the positioning model has failed and the SDK will retry the download
      START_DOWNLOADING_POSITIONING_MODEL
      The download of the positioning model will start
      STARTING
      The positioning system is starting
      STARTING_POSITIONING
      The positioning is starting, it will start to capture and send data
      STOPPED
      The positioning system is stopped.
      TIME_SETTINGS_MANUAL
      Time settings configured manually by the user
      USER_NOT_IN_BUILDING
      The user is not in the building calibrated area.
      WIFI_SCAN_THROTTLED
      The WiFi scan is throttled,the interval will be changed to one scan every 30 seconds

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • STARTING

        public static final LocationStatus STARTING
        The positioning system is starting

      • PREPARING_POSITIONING_MODEL

        public static final LocationStatus PREPARING_POSITIONING_MODEL
        The positioning model is been prepared to be used

      • START_DOWNLOADING_POSITIONING_MODEL

        public static final LocationStatus START_DOWNLOADING_POSITIONING_MODEL
        The download of the positioning model will start

      • RETRY_DOWNLOAD_POSITIONING_MODEL

        public static final LocationStatus RETRY_DOWNLOAD_POSITIONING_MODEL
        The download of the positioning model has failed and the SDK will retry the download

      • PROCESSING_POSITIONING_MODEL

        public static final LocationStatus PROCESSING_POSITIONING_MODEL
        The positioning model is been processed after download

      • STARTING_POSITIONING

        public static final LocationStatus STARTING_POSITIONING
        The positioning is starting, it will start to capture and send data

      • USER_NOT_IN_BUILDING

        public static final LocationStatus USER_NOT_IN_BUILDING
        The user is not in the building calibrated area. Only received in indoor mode

      • CALCULATING

        public static final LocationStatus CALCULATING
        The positioning service is calculating the user location. A "keep walking" or loading message can be shown to the user

      • NO_CONNECTION

        public static final LocationStatus NO_CONNECTION
        Warning received when no internet connection is available

      • COMPASS_CALIBRATION_NEEDED

        public static final LocationStatus COMPASS_CALIBRATION_NEEDED
        The compass is uncalibrated and need to be calibrated

      • COMPASS_CALIBRATION_NOT_NEEDED

        public static final LocationStatus COMPASS_CALIBRATION_NOT_NEEDED
        The compass is now calibrated and sending valid data

      • BLE_NOT_AVAILABLE

        public static final LocationStatus BLE_NOT_AVAILABLE
        Bluetooth not available or using Android SDK API < 18. BLE scanning is not supported before API 18

      • TIME_SETTINGS_MANUAL

        public static final LocationStatus TIME_SETTINGS_MANUAL
        Time settings configured manually by the user

      • GLOBAL_LOCATION_NOT_FOUND

        public static final LocationStatus GLOBAL_LOCATION_NOT_FOUND
        Used in indoor-outdoor mode during initialization. This is returned when Google Location provider doesn't return locations in the first 30s. The location system will keep trying to receive a location.

      • BLE_SENSOR_DISABLED_BY_USER

        public static final LocationStatus BLE_SENSOR_DISABLED_BY_USER
        The BLE sensor has been disabled by the user. BLE scanning will be disabled if LocationRequest.useBle() is true and LocationRequest.autoEnableBleDuringPositioning() is false.

      • LOCATION_DISABLED

        public static final LocationStatus LOCATION_DISABLED
        The location has been disabled. Wi-Fi will stop scanning and BLE will stop in most devices. You should prompt the user to enable location

      • WIFI_SCAN_THROTTLED

        public static final LocationStatus WIFI_SCAN_THROTTLED
        The WiFi scan is throttled,the interval will be changed to one scan every 30 seconds

      • STOPPED

        public static final LocationStatus STOPPED
        The positioning system is stopped.
